revtext: Its a great exp at WIG -O - MANIA getting my confidence back, which i lost due to hair fall. Management gives gd support over customers. specially they were taking precuations and planning over COVID -19, while entering itself will sanitize and check fr temperature without any physical contact and maintaining social distancing . Its really impressive . Thank you aiysha mam and your team ..
revreply: Thank you so much for your appreciation of our products and service. It makes us more determined to make a difference in people\'s lives. We are indeed very conscious of our social responsibility and commitment to our clients and staff. Hence we are taking all possible precautions to ensure social distancing is maintained and sanitisation at our hair studios. #StayBlessed #StaySafe
